alert.note: Alert for Carter; Greene; Hawkins; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 6:12PM CDT until June 04 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sullivan County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Hawkins County in east Tennessee... Washington County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Greene County in east Tennessee... Northern Unicoi County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Carter County in east Tennessee... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 711 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pine Crest, or near Elizabethton, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Elizabethton, Erwin, Jonesborough, Surgoinsville, Banner Hill, Central, Spurgeon and Midway. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 2 and 45. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 45 and 68. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Carter; Greene; Hawkins; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington
